description:
Here at the Dozier Law Firm in Savannah, Georgia, we offer a full range of quality legal services to help you with all the important and pressing issues affecting your life and livelihood, your finances, your freedom and your future. With three additional offices across the state, we have become one of Georgia's premier full-service law firms for those with complex legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury claims arising from car and truck accidents, slip-and-falls and other preventable tragedies
  • Medical malpractice and nursing home abuse
  • Workers' compensation
  • Social Security Disability
  • Criminal defense
  • Bankruptcy

Through our personal injury practice, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, including many multimillion-dollar awards, and we are members of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum. Equally effective in our other practice areas, we have been providing representation for hundreds of clients with serious and pressing legal issues for more than 50 years now. During this time, we have gained a reputation for our unwavering commitment to serving our clients' needs as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

Recognized for our outstanding professionalism and service, our lawyers have earned designation on The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100 list and recognition as among the best car accident lawyers from Expertise. We have also received many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers as well as numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To find out more about how we can best assist you with the legal issues you face, you can contact the Dozier Law Firm to schedule a free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
